about.description: Skilled in Java, JavaScript, DSA and web development with a Bachelor of Computer Science from Umaer Basha Institute of Technology (UBIT) and currently persuing Masters in Data Science from National University of Computing and Emerging Sciences (FAST). I am a motivated engineer utilizing Java and Spring Boot to built a customer friendly solutions with the goal of establishing myself in the technical field.I've always had a creative streak, therefore I'm looking forward to use technical expertise to create with the realm of currently existing technologies.According to me, Software engineering is a fascinating blend of creativity and logic, where we craft solutions that shape the digital world

points: Developed scalable backend APIs with Spring Boot.
Deployed microservices on AWS cloud environment.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
Led development of real-time analytics dashboards.
